name: dankness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of buildings and air) the fact 0f being wet, cold, and unpleasant: There was a dankness in the air. She was a little surprised by the dankness of the place. See
dank
More examplesFewer examplesHe hurried through the dankness of the tunnel.I moved into the basement of their house and seldom came up from its dankness.At about 4 o'clock, the dankness lifted.
